metadata.title: CVE-2023-47359 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Videolan VLC prior to version 3.0.20 contains an incorrect offset read thatleads to a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function GetPacket() and resultsin a memory corruption.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
